Title: Rubik Cube's 3D Silverlight 3.0 Animated Solution
Description: Rubik Cube's Silverlight 3.0 Animated Solution is a 3D presentation of Rubik Cube in range of up to 7x7x7 size with full functionality and an animated solution for 3x3x3 size.
HomeWiki:
Platform: Silverlight 3.0 in .NET Framework 3.5
Language: C# - MS Visual Web Developer 2008 Express Edition
Sample Demo: http://galka-vorona.com/rubikcube.html

This project is a realization of 3D presentation of a Rubik Cube. It presents all the Rubik Cube functionality for 1x1x1 to 7x7x7 cubes, including rotating all the slices of the cube, random shuffling and an animated solution, developed for a 3x3x3 cube.
